604d806d-e3a6-4451-9bd1-2c4eceb2b3d2.description: This course provides delegates with the essential elements of the programming language of SAS and an understanding of the fundamental processing. Ideal for the complete novice, the course is also incredibly useful for those who have worked with the programming language of SAS but lack formal education on its inner workings.
604d806d-e3a6-4451-9bd1-2c4eceb2b3d2.name: Fundamentals: The Language of SAS

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the course in order to develop essential skills in the programming language of SAS including DATA and PROC steps, KEEP and DROP to select variables, Conditional Processing with IF-THEN-ELSE and how to summarise data with the FREQ, MEANS and UNIVARIATE procedures.

9207c75d-0ccf-41ca-ac18-eac2a1c68dfe.description: The Raw Data Handling course provides the means to read from and create your own external data files, in both fixed width and delimited format, enabling the delegate to apply all the previously learnt data manipulation and reporting techniques to present it in a consistent manner using statements and functions.
9207c75d-0ccf-41ca-ac18-eac2a1c68dfe.name: Raw Data Handling: The Language of SAS

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of this course in order to develop essential skills in the programming language of SAS to read from and write to  simple and formatted Raw Data files using INFILE and INPUT and  FILE and PUT statements.

5b000e9c-2693-4f70-b07e-59782be2100c.description: Building on the learnings provided in the Fundamentals course, this course provides learners with an immediately useful armoury of new statements and functions in the programming language of SAS.
5b000e9c-2693-4f70-b07e-59782be2100c.name: Intermediate: The Language of SAS

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the course in order to develop essential  skills in the programming language of SAS learning how to sort data with PROC SORT, summarise observations, manipulate data using Functions, debug programs using PUT statements, make use of iterative processing techniques and present and format data.

d4ad6921-67a1-4c9e-ab0c-7405909f1b9d.description: This course not only provides delegates with a broad understanding of the underlying processing of the language of SAS, but also a breadth of understanding when it comes to programming syntax. This in-depth course is suitable for both the complete novice, and those who have previous exposure to the language of SAS, but who lack formal education on its inner workings. This course covers the curriculum required to sit the SAS Certified Specialist - Base Programmer for SAS 9 Certification.
d4ad6921-67a1-4c9e-ab0c-7405909f1b9d.name: Fast-Track Base Programming: The Language of SAS

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the course in order to develop essential skills in the programming language of SAS including KEEP and DROP to select variables, IF and WHERE to select observations and IF-THEN-ELSE conditional processing. Summarise data using the FREQ, MEANS and UNIVARIATE procedures. Use PROC SORT and BY-GROUP processing, Functions to manipulate data and change data type, DO-Loop Iterative & Conditional processing. Debug programs using PUT and PUTLOG statements, format and present data.

ffa3668d-619f-4ff1-8483-0543c204137c.description: This course teaches you techniques to make your programs smarter and easier to maintain. Learn how to write dynamic data-dependent code using macro variables and macro programs.
ffa3668d-619f-4ff1-8483-0543c204137c.name: Macros: The Language of SAS

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the course in order to develop essential  skills in the programming language of SAS including an introduction into Macro processing and variables, learning how to program Macros and make use of Macro functions, define Global and Local Symbol Tables, use conditional processing techniques and create and use Macro variables in a Data Step and PROC SQL.

a59e8f48-9544-49ea-a304-d4698881607c.description: As part of The Language of SAS, the PROC SQL course is ideal for those looking to add to their professional knowledge. From learning how to use ANSI-standard Structured Query Language (SQL) syntax in conjunction with the programming language of SAS to build queries. PROC SQL can perform many similar tasks to DATA step code.
a59e8f48-9544-49ea-a304-d4698881607c.name: PROC SQL: The Language of SAS

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of this course in order to develop essential  skills in Structured Query Language (SQL) and learn how to apply it within the programming language of SAS.  Delegates will learn key PROC SQL elements and report presentation techniques including how to write SQL subqueries, create and maintain data tables from results and join datasets horizontally and vertically.

49e7e34a-7e33-47ac-9ca5-bb6a59595623.description: The Reporting Techniques course provides delegates with in-depth techniques for generating reports and output using the Language of SAS Output Delivery System (ODS) and the REPORT and TABULATE Procedures.
49e7e34a-7e33-47ac-9ca5-bb6a59595623.name: Reporting Techniques: The Language of SAS

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the course in order to develop essential skills in the Language of SAS to apply PROC REPORT and PROC TABULATE techniques such as BREAK and RBREAK, computed columns,  DEFINE Statement Attribute Options, customise Row and Column headings, format cell data and utilise BY Group processing to help visualise data. Also learn how to use the Language of SAS Output Delivery System (ODS)  to identify objects, output data and export to Excel.

e94d9c41-f603-4b34-90ba-613b61014871.description: Our course provides delegates with an overview of the core skills required to be effective in the workplace and succeed in the world of business. Giving them a 'tool kit' to develop confidence and be able to contribute from the outset.
e94d9c41-f603-4b34-90ba-613b61014871.name: Business Fundamentals

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of this course to develop essential skills in time management, effective meeting strategies, written and oral communications skills and assertiveness skills. The course is suitable for those new to the workforce or those who wish to 'brush -up' on their skills as they progress in their career.

20ef23dd-bf41-4235-87e5-154cf8433f2f.description: This course is designed to help you adopt safe and secure working practices in the workplace, whether in the office or at home. You will acquire a range of knowledge, skills, tips and tools to be effective amongst both your peers and those who manage you. It is aimed at employees at all levels of business. Some of the modules contain useful materials, such as eBooks, that you can download and keep for reference.
20ef23dd-bf41-4235-87e5-154cf8433f2f.name: Safe and Secure Working Practices for Data Professionals

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: By the end of this course, you will be able to: (1) Set up your workstation and use mobile devices safely at work; (2) Create a homeworking environment that works for you; (3) Know the importance of handling personal data correctly and the implications of not doing so; and (4) Adopt safe working practices in the office.

skills.name: Health and Safety in the Workplace

f7d9644b-c39b-4b74-b970-2692b34cea40.description: Stand out from the crowd with the Advanced Programming course, covering advanced aspects of the programming language of SAS and considering how to implement coding efficiencies.
f7d9644b-c39b-4b74-b970-2692b34cea40.name: Advanced Programming: The Language of SAS

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the course in order to develop advanced skills in the programming language of SAS including techniques to optimise task processing, measure efficiencies and use Trade-Offs to decide which efficiency options to choose. Understand how character and numeric data are stored. I/O Processing to read, alter and write data. Dataset Compression. When and how to use an Index. Options for Sorting and Selecting observations. Using Formats, Arrays and Hash Object table lookups.

918ab748-a132-41cb-8f0e-df81667b2809.description: This course will provide delegates with a deeper understanding of the language of SAS, building on existing knowledge gained from the Scottish Government In-House SAS course. It combines a range of topics to provide the required next step training for analysts and statisticians. You will benefit from hands-on exercises to apply your new skills and knowledge throughout the course.
918ab748-a132-41cb-8f0e-df81667b2809.name: SAS Intermediate for the Scottish Government

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the course will enable you to:  implement more advanced Data Step techniques to manage your data more efficiently, including BY group processing, merging, iterative processing and arrays; utilise dataset options, formats and functions and;  recognise the different types of errors, decipher LOG messages and recall methods for debugging programs.

71c6577d-b14b-43c5-8641-2f543c569d15.description: The Advanced Programming course covers those advanced features and options of the programming language of SAS that will enable you to write more complex code and stand out from the crowd.
71c6577d-b14b-43c5-8641-2f543c569d15.name: Advanced Programming: The Language of SAS (2020)

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the course in order to develop advanced skills in the programming language of SAS including techniques for Sorting and Selecting observations. Using Formats, Arrays and Hash Objects in  Lookup tables, Combining DataSets, Advanced Functions, and an understanding of PERL regular expressions.

skills.name: Using Hash And Hash Iterator (Hiter) Objects

47bad2e1-d2c6-4f4a-a56d-d36a86672685.description: This course covers the additional Macro techniques used in the programming language of SAS enabling you to write dynamic Macros and extend the functionality of your code.
47bad2e1-d2c6-4f4a-a56d-d36a86672685.name: Advanced Macros: The Language of SAS

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the course in order to further develop macro skills in the programming language of SAS including handling special characters at Compilation and Execution phases of macro processing. You will also learn how to use functions and call routines, evaluate numeric expressions, use Macros effectively and create Macrro Applications.

1160c0c0-7b4d-4564-8840-310beec13aa7.description: This course provides an introduction to and understanding of the application of statistical techniques such as Analysis of Variance, Linear Regression and Logistic Regression. 'Essential ANOVA, Linear and Logistic Regression: The Language of SAS
1160c0c0-7b4d-4564-8840-310beec13aa7.name: Essential ANOVA, Linear and Logistic Regression: The Language of SAS

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the course in order to develop essential skills to enable writing SAS code to perform descriptive and inferential statistical analysis and build powerful predictive models that will aid impactful business decisions and strategies.

02a05058-9de6-49cb-89d9-39fab0c6ecd2.description: This Learning Pathway will provide you with the knowledge, tools and techniques to enhance your code and which you can apply in a wide range of settings to make your programs smarter. Learn how to write flexible and efficient code using macro variables and functions.
02a05058-9de6-49cb-89d9-39fab0c6ecd2.name: Macro Programming : The Language of SAS (Level 1)

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: By the end of this pathway you will be able to: (1) Explain the introductory elements and concepts of the Language of SAS;  (2) Describe ten fundamental Programming Concepts within the Language of SAS; and (3) Describe how macro variables and macro functions can be used to help you write more efficient code will in the Language of SAS.
There are mini quizzes and comprehensive exercises throughout to help assess and reinforce your learning.

31ea1fcf-672d-4ccc-8c53-4455b1e33c5b.description: This learning pathway will give you a solid understanding of the Python building blocks from which to progress on to Python programming.
31ea1fcf-672d-4ccc-8c53-4455b1e33c5b.name: Python for SAS Programmers (Level 1)

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: By the end of this pathway you will be able to:  (1) Explain the differences between SAS Procedural Programming Language (PPL) and Python's Object Orientated Programming (OOP) framework; (2) Describe the basic concepts of Python syntax; and (3) Describe what data objects are and how they relate to a Class.
There are mini quizzes and comprehensive exercises throughout to help assess and reinforce your learning.

5b9b1534-cec2-4a44-b20e-52cabe49bfaa.description: This course provides an introduction to and understanding of the application of statistical techniques such as Analysis of Variance, Linear Regression and Logistic Regression, including a practical workshop utilising powerful statistical methods for data reduction purposes.
5b9b1534-cec2-4a44-b20e-52cabe49bfaa.name: Statistical Business Analysis: The Language of SAS

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the course in order to develop essential skills to enable writing SAS code to perform descriptive and inferential statistical analysis, build powerful predictive models with efficient use of data reduction techniques which will aid impactful business decisions and strategies.

a7f1f788-0fdf-437b-94a8-a413aebb5eba.description: This course is designed to help you, as a data professional, develop your own personal impact in the workplace. You will acquire a range of knowledge, skills and tools to be effective amongst your peers, whilst seeking to influence those who you work with and/or manage you.
a7f1f788-0fdf-437b-94a8-a413aebb5eba.name: Business Skills for Data Professionals

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: By the end of this course, you will be able to: (1) Adopt strategies for communicating with and influencing others effectively; (2) Employ behaviours to work positively with others in teams; (3) Identify key skills for effective business writing, including emails and reports; and (4) Implement critical thinking and problem-solving techniques to help solve your most pressing challenges.

b9761229-b2cd-4916-bb3c-9a90776f8fa3.description: This course provides delegates with the essential elements of programming in Python to be able to extract data, manipulate data and prepare data through the use of Python scripts.
b9761229-b2cd-4916-bb3c-9a90776f8fa3.name: Python for Data Analysts

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the course in order to develop essential skills to enable writing Python code including pandas, numpy, aggregating and grouping data, loops and branching, variables, functions, combining data horizontally and vertically and metadata.

39709373-93b1-4a50-ae06-10b005431ad7.description: Python for Data Analytics is an overview of the Python language with a focus on the Python Data Analysis Library (pandas) and provides an introduction to the techniques and skills to prepare data for further uses such as reporting and data analysis. The course will enable you to use Python and pandas to create data files that have been properly processed and cleaned for commercial use.
39709373-93b1-4a50-ae06-10b005431ad7.name: Python for Data Analytics

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the course in order to develop essential skills to enable writing Python code including pandas, numpy, aggregating and grouping data, loops and branching, variables, functions, combining data horizontally and vertically  and metadata.

92d13ffd-2525-4f97-a884-510fe88b1cbd.description: The Python for SAS Programmers course provides delegates with the essential elements of programming in Python to be able to extract data, manipulate data and prepare data through the use of Python scripts. It will enable you to transfer your understanding and experience of working with the Language of SAS to develop meaningful programs and achieve the required results in Python.
92d13ffd-2525-4f97-a884-510fe88b1cbd.name: Python for SAS Programmers

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the course in order to develop essential skills to enable writing Python code including pandas, numpy, aggregating and grouping data, loops and branching, variables, functions, combining data horizontally and vertically and metadata.

6309b04a-1ace-4373-91af-8aab985492f8.description: This 3 day course will further develop delegates skills in the Language of SAS building on knowledge gained from attending our bespoke SAS Intermediate course for the Scottish Government and a minimum of 9 months practical use. You will learn advanced techniques to apply to your code and how to interpret these in existing code. Through hands-on exercises you will also gain a deeper understanding of how the data is being processed and how to write efficient program code.
6309b04a-1ace-4373-91af-8aab985492f8.name: SAS Advanced for the Scottish Government

issuer.summary: issued by Newtyne Consultancy & Training Limited

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the course in order to further develop skills to make processing more efficient in the Programming Language of SAS using techniques such as Optimising Task Processing and Data Storage, Creating and Using Indexes, Multi-Dimensional Arrays, Hash Objects and Combining datasets with Lookup Tables. Gaining a deeper insight and understanding of data to make better informed business decisions.
